title: A Walk in the Sun/UCLA Restored Edition (1945) RICHARD CONTE

sources.title: A Walk in the Sun/UCLA Restored Edition (1945) RICHARD CONTE
sources.description:
DEFINITIVE RESTORED VERSION by UCLA FILM ARCHIVE
Director: Lewis Milestone
Stars: Dana Andrews, Richard Conte, Lloyd Bridges, Huntz Hall
Screenplay: Robert Rosen
Narrated by:  Burgess Meredith

One of the most powerful war films ever made. Set during WWII, it explores the thoughts and personalities of ordinary infantrymen under extraordinary pressure. Their mission: blow up an enemy bridge and capture a strategic farmhouse heavily garrisoned by Nazi troops. Who will rise to the occasion or who will crumble? Who will live and who will die?
